plugins.name: VV-BOX
plugins.description:
这是一款设计师辅助工具，现功能有：


  1. 整理排序画板：用户可以设置上下和左右间距，插件会按照这些设定对全局画板进行排序和位置调整，最终实现画板从左到右、从上到下的有序排列；也可激活选取排序画板选项只对选取的画板进行排序，默认为关闭。
  2. 画板前缀命名：插件会对画板进行重命名，按照画板在页面的位置，如第一行的第一个画板会被命名为'101_原名'，第二行的第三个画板会被命名为'203_原名'。
  3. 全局字体替换：选中字体层，即可将文档中和选中字体层一样的全部字体进行替换（不局限于字号）。


后续会新增更多的实用小工具，敬请期待……


-----------------------------------------------------------------------


This is an auxiliary tool for designers, with current features including:


  1. Sort Frames: Users can set vertical and horizontal spacing, and the plugin will sort and reposition all frames accordingly, ultimately achieving an orderly layout of frames from left to right and top to bottom. There is also an option to sort only selected frames, which is turned off by default.
  2. Rename Frames: The plugin renames frames based on their position on the page. For example, the first frame in the first row will be renamed '101_OriginalName', and the third frame in the second row will be renamed '203_OriginalName'.
  3. Global Font Replacement: By selecting a text layer, you can replace all fonts in the document that match the selected text layer's font (not limited to font size).


More practical tools will be added in the future, so stay tuned...
plugins.tagline: 支持一键画板排序，一键添加画板前缀名，一键全局字体替换等功能；中英文界面切换，简单，好用。

plugins.name: Cult Translator
plugins.description:
With more than 180 languages, Cult Translator is a next-generation translator plugin for Figma designed to make your translations easy, fast, and precise. By allowing you to add context, this tool ensures that every translation reflects the true intent of your original design.


Context-Driven Accuracy:


Enhanced Reliability: Provide context such as “This button triggers a payment process” or “Used in a formal corporate environment,” and the AI will deliver translations that capture the intended tone and meaning.


Clarifying Ambiguities: For example, if your design uses the term “pitch,” a context note like “referring to a sales pitch” prevents misinterpretation, ensuring the right word is chosen in the target language.


Localization:


Beyond just word-for-word translation, Cult Translator adapts your content to the cultural nuances of your target audience. This means that regional references (e. g. people's names, music genres, foods, dance styles, currency types, etc.) are adjusted so your message resonates naturally with local users.


Export for Review:


Keep track of every change! The plugin allows you to export a detailed log of all translations, enabling designers, translators, and reviewers to collaborate efficiently and ensure consistency across your projects.


How to Use:


  1. Select Elements: Choose text layers, groups, or frames in your design.


  1. Add Context: Enter any additional context in the dedicated field to guide the translation process.


  1. Choose Languages: Select your source and target languages using our intuitive, searchable dropdown menus.


  1. Translate & Localize: Click “Translate” for a context-enhanced conversion or “Localize” for a culturally adapted version.


  1. Export Log: Easily export a review log of all translations for quality control and collaboration.


Works on Figma and FigJam:


Designed for both Figma and FigJam, Cult Translator works smoothly across platforms, making it perfect for design teams and collaborative environments.


Light & Dark Mode Support:


Enjoy a visually consistent experience regardless of your theme preference. CultTranslator is optimized for both light and dark modes.

accepted.name: Cult Extensions
accepted.description: Hello! We're Cult Extensions, building localization and culturalization tools to connect creatives with global audiences seamlessly 🌍✨

plugins.tagline: Instantly Translate and Localize Your Designs – Speak Your User's Language!

plugins.name: batch font replacer & swap/change/replace/fix fonts
plugins.description:
1. Product Overview

Batch Font Replacer is a powerful Figma plugin that enables designers to quickly swap fonts, bringing creativity to life. Compatible with both Figma and FigJam, it ensures brand consistency and cohesive design styles with ease.


2. Efficient Font Replacement

No matter the project size, Batch Font Replacer lets you batch replace fonts swiftly, from selected elements to the entire file, streamlining your design process.


3. Practical Features & Customization

Batch Font Replacer provides robust features like quick search, missing font replacement, and local style application, enabling designers to make precise adjustments with ease.


4. Creative Freedom & Missing Font Detection

Batch Font Replacer makes font changes effortless, enhancing creative freedom while ensuring design completeness with missing font detection.


Do you need to support Mixed Text? Feel free to leave a comment and let me know
plugins.tagline: effortless, batch font replacement across any design, enhancing creativity

plugins.name: Peppercorn - Match Text Styles & Scales
plugins.description:
It allows you to seamlessly parse all your text styles and match them with a range of typography scales.

Key features include:

  1. Refine Your Current Typography Scale: Easily adjust and fine-tune your existing typography scale for improved visual harmony and readability in your designs.
  2. Adapt Typography for Different Devices: With Peppercorn, you can quickly find and apply a different typography scale for other devices by changing just one value, ensuring your design's responsiveness and versatility.

Additional Use Cases:

  1. Enhance Brand Consistency: Maintain a consistent typographic style across various design projects, reinforcing brand identity.
  2. Optimize User Experience: Utilize harmonious typography scales to improve user experience through clear, accessible text.
  3. Save Time in Design Process: Streamline your workflow by quickly comparing and applying typography scales, freeing up time for other creative tasks.
  4. Design Exploration: Experiment with different typography scales to discover new, impactful ways to present your content.



New: If you want to automatically generate a new type scale, very flexible, with documentation, variables & text styles, go check out my other plugin: https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1324368566737768121/peppercorn-typography-scale-generator

plugins.name: Banana Test
plugins.description:
Test your interfaces to UX using "Banana-test" so easy!


Idea of plugin:

When you are testing the layout of some page where the user has to perform an action, try replacing all the texts with the word "Banana" or some nonsense like this. And then with this "sanitized" layout, you need to do corridor testing. And even if it is clear to all users what each interface element means, then this is a good interface! This means that you can easily connect other languages to your site, and even in case of a translation error in the interface text, the user will still be able to complete his task.

Of course, it makes no sense to conduct such tests on information blogs. But for some online store, this is quite a good way to check that the "Buy" button will be pressed, even if the fonts fall off.


Features:

This plugin can:

  • Replace all text in selected nodes to "Banana" or anything else
  • Clone selected nodes and replace text in this new nodes. It's more safely!


How to use?

  1. Run "Banana Test" plugin in Figma file.
  2. Select nodes, which you want to test.
  3. Click Banananizate 🍌 button.
  4. And "Voila!)" You have a lot of bananas!)


Contacts:

  • Email: me@jagk.ru
  • Plugin Homepage: Figma Community
  • Repository: GitHub
  • My GitHub: @jag-k

accepted.name: Jag_k
accepted.description: Full-stack developer

plugins.tagline: Test your interfaces to UX using "Banana-test" so easy!

plugins.name: upper-mask
plugins.description:
About

This is a plugin that performs clipping masks using shapes placed on top. It behaves similarly to the clipping mask function in Adobe Illustrator.


How to use

Right-click while selecting multiple objects and shapes that you want to mask.

Create a mask by selecting Plugins -> upper-mask from the context menu.


When used, a mask group is automatically created. The target shape is moved to the back of the group and becomes a mask mode.



-----

JP:


About

上に置いたシェイプを使って、クリッピングマスクを行うプラグインです。

Adobe Illustratorのクリッピングマスク機能と似たような挙動をします。


How to use

マスクしたいオブジェクトとシェイプを複数選択した状態で右クリックします。

コンテキストメニューの Plugins -> upper-mask でマスクを作成します。


使用すると自動的にマスクグループが作成されます。 対象のシェイプはグループの最背面に移動し、マスクモードになります。
plugins.tagline: Masks with upper shape

plugins.name: FigLink
plugins.description:
Use FigLink to swap instances or any node with the same name or selected component.


If you are migrating from Sketch, First import all of your Sketch files, including library and other artboards, then publish components.

After publishing the components, run the "Collect Components" command from the plugin menu and wait for collecting.

Now go to each file in your team, run the "Link Instances to Library" command from the plugin menu and wait.


It looks for instances with the same name as your library components and replaces them with a new instance of the library component.


It preserves text overrides based on the position of text nodes.


Add "_" or "." to the starting of the component or page's name to skip collecting them. It also skips hidden nodes or nodes with a name starting with "_" or ".".

accepted.name: Saeed Alipoor
accepted.description:
A 3D Man, Dad, Dreamer, Devigner.
UXE figma.com/@thewall

plugins.tagline: Replace nodes with component instances and preserve changes

plugins.name: fts extractor
plugins.description:
Extract texts from your designs in a structured format as yaml or json.


This simple plugin is a complementary tool of flutter translator sheet.


Usage:


Just select any amount of elements on your canvas (Layers, Pages, Components), and select Plugins > fts extractor >

And choose one of the menu options.


It will generate a structured tree from the Strings found in the selection, based on the document's nodes hierarchy, so you can have a "cleaner" output if you name your layers properly.


The layers represents the field names in the yaml / json output. They are sanitized for illegal characters, spaces, and normalized in snake_case style.


Here's an example of the type of output you can get:


payment_details:
 card_details: Card Details
 mastercard:
  eden_hazard: Eden Hazard
  k_4754: '4754'
  k_3243: '3243'
  k_25000_aed: 25000 AED
 payment_details: ' Payment details'
 holder_name: Holder name
 card_number: Card number
 coupon_promo_code: coupon/ promo code
 m_m_yy: MM/YY
 cvv: CVV
 button_s_primary_default:
  confirm: Confirm



The idea is that you modify this file as needed to use as master template in fts cli.


So, power-up your Flutter development flow on internationalization, using flutter translator sheet, Figma and the fts extractor plugin.

accepted.name: Rodrigo López
accepted.description: flutter dev.

plugins.name: Sustainability UI checker by Sparck
plugins.description:
Sustainability UI checker is a Figma plugin that helps designers to create more energy-efficient UIs. It analyses each element of the UI and shows if its power consumption is low, moderate, or high. It also shows the cause of the high power consumption and possible solutions to reduce it.


How it works

  1. Each element of the UI it shows if the power consumption will be low, moderate or high. This will help designers to identify the elements of their UI that are most energy-intensive and make changes to improve their energy efficiency.
  2. It will show the cause of the modahigh power consumption. This will help designers to understand why certain elements of their UI are more energy-intensive than others.
  3. It will show possible solutions to reduce the power consumption. This will help designers to make changes to their UI that will reduce its energy consumption without sacrificing its usability or design.
  4. It will show the source of the information. This will allow designers to verify the accuracy of the information and to learn more about the factors that affect the power consumption of UI elements.



Here are some of the benefits of using Sustainability UI checker:

  1. Reduce the energy consumption of your UI. Sustainability UI checker can help you to identify the elements of your UI that are most energy-intensive and make changes to improve their energy efficiency. This can help to reduce the environmental impact of your website or application.
  2. Improve the performance of your UI. By reducing the power consumption of your UI, you can also improve its performance. This can make your UI more responsive and user-friendly.
  3. Save money. Reducing the energy consumption of your UI can save you money on your energy bills. This is especially beneficial for businesses with large websites or applications.


If you are a designer who is looking to create more energy-efficient UIs, then Sustainability UI checker is a great tool for you. It is easy to use and it can help you to make a real difference to the environmental impact of your work.
plugins.tagline: Audit UI elements energy efficiency with Figma sustainability checker plugin.

plugins.name: Design System Radar
plugins.description:
Overview

Design System Radar is a specialized Figma plugin tailored for users of design system. This plugin enhances the user experience by providing robust tools for ensuring compliance with design system's standards, particularly focusing on spacing and style variables. It's an essential tool for designers who aim to maintain high levels of consistency and precision in their designs.


Features

  • Spacing Analysis: The plugin automatically identifies spacing discrepancies within selected frames, instances, and components. It compares these against design system's established spacing guidelines, flagging any non-conformities for review.
  • Style Variable Analysis: Design System Radar detects elements in your designs that are not bound to style variables. This feature is crucial for maintaining uniformity across your design projects.
  • Navigation for Quick Corrections: Users can quickly navigate to any elements that do not conform to design system directly from the plugin's interface, streamlining the design refinement process.


How to use?

Add [ds-radar]to the description of your main components so that they are detected by the "Instances" part of the plugin. And you can provide your own dimension system by entering values (in px) in the "Dimension" part of the plugin.

accepted.name: Martin Molcrette
accepted.description: UX/UI Designer

plugins.tagline: Design System compliance made easy with Design System Radar for Figma

plugins.name: iOS 日本語システムフォント サイズ計算
plugins.description:
iOSでシステムフォントを指定して日本語のテキストラベルを表示した場合、実際に指定したフォントサイズよりも小さく表示されます。

この課題に関する詳しい話は記事にも書いています。

iOSアプリのシステムフォントにおける日本語のフォントサイズとのギャップを減らす工夫


Figmaではこのようなシステムフォントを再現することができないため、Figmaで作成したテキストラベルと同じ大きさの日本語テキストラベルを表示するためのサイズを計算し、レイヤー名に追加します。


エンジニアはテキストのレイヤー名に表示されるフォントサイズを実装時に指定することで、同じ文字サイズを表示することができます。


使い方

  • 適用したいテキストオブジェクトを選択状態にします（グループを選択したり、複数選択した場合は、選択したすべてのテキストオブジェクトに適用されます）
  • iOS ja system font sizeプラグインのInteger/Floatをメニューから実行します
  • Integerは小数点以下を四捨五入し、整数で表示します
  • Floatは小数点第二位以下を四捨五入し、小数も含めて表示します（より正確にしたい場合にお使いください）
  • レイヤー名の先頭に*が入っている場合は、Figmaで指定した通りのフォントサイズを追加します（アルファベットや数字のみで表示される箇所など、実際の指定通りのサイズのままにしておきたい箇所にお使いください）


GitHub: https://github.com/kudakurage/figma-ios-ja-font-size

accepted.name: Kaz Motoyama @kudakurage
accepted.description: Product Manager / Designer at Puddle Sketch. Spinners Inc. co-founder.

plugins.name: VectorMeasure Pro
plugins.description:
VectorMeasure Pro is an essential Figma plugin that simplifies the process of measuring the length of any type of vector within your design project. Whether it's lines, paths, or complex shapes, this plugin provides precise measurements with ease.

Key Features:

  1. Universal Vector Measurement: It supports all types of vectors in Figma, making it a versatile tool for designers working on various projects.
  2. Easy-to-Use Interface: The plugin boasts an intuitive and user-friendly interface, ensuring that designers of all levels can effortlessly utilize its measurement capabilities.
  3. Pixel-Perfect Accuracy: Get pixel-perfect measurements, ensuring your designs are always on point and in line with your vision.
  4. Efficient Workflow: Streamline your design workflow by eliminating the need for manual calculations or external measurement tools.
  5. Instant Results: Receive instant measurements without the hassle of switching between different tools or applications.
  6. Export and Share: Easily export measurement data or share it with your team, enhancing collaboration and design accuracy.

How It Works:

  1. Select the vector or vectors you want to measure within your Figma project.
  2. Launch the plugin from the Figma menu.
  3. Instantly receive precise measurements of your selected vectors in the units of your choice.
  4. Use the measurement data to fine-tune your designs and maintain consistency throughout your project.

The plugin is designed to save you time, boost accuracy, and enhance your overall Figma design experience. Say goodbye to the guesswork and manual calculations – start measuring vectors effortlessly with VectorMeasure Pro!
plugins.tagline: Caluate the length of vector lines

plugins.name: X-Sitemapper
plugins.description:
Transform your site planning process with the X-SiteMapper. Simply upload a CSV file, and watch as it automatically generates a clear, visual sitemap, perfect for planning and collaboration. Whether you’re designing a new website, auditing existing structures, or planning user journeys, this tool makes it easy to visualise site architecture and communicate your vision. Save time, reduce errors, and improve collaboration with this intuitive and efficient plugin.


Before uploading your CSV file, please ensure it meets the following criteria:


1. The file should contain only a single column with all URLs listed.

2. The top entry must be the root/home URL.

3. There should be no empty rows in the column.

4. Each URL must be a full URL (e.g., https://example.com/category1/page1) rather than a relative path (e.g., /category1/page1).


Once your CSV file is correctly structured, upload it to X-SiteMapper, and it will generate the sitemap for you.

- Each sitemap level will be created in a separate frame.

- The tool supports up to 5 levels of sub-pages.

- The frames are able to be viewed as a prototype that can expand and collapse the different levels of pages by clicking the “+” and “-” icons displayed next to the page names.


If you have any questions please feel free to reach out to sitemapper@vml.com
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly create interactive sitemaps from CSV files in seconds

plugins.description:
Bring creativity to your designs with ASCII Punk! This Figma plugin transforms any image into fully customizable ASCII art, giving your visuals a unique and artistic edge. Whether you're experimenting with image effects or crafting standout designs, ASCII Punk is here to inspire.


Why Use ASCII Punk?


  1. Custom Backgrounds: Change the background color to complement your design.
  2. Adjustable Precision: Resize character size to get the perfect level of detail.
  3. Personalized Characters: Choose your own set of ASCII characters to make your art unique.
  4. Export Type: Choose to export ASCII effect as either an image or a group of nodes.


Designed for creative professionals and enthusiasts alike, ASCII Punk is a versatile tool for adding personality to your designs. Try it today and discover new ways to reimagine your images!

plugins.name: BilingualFonts
plugins.description:
这款插件能够协助您在中英文排版时应用指定的字体样式（即 Text Styles），同时自动在中文与半角英文、数字、符号间添加空格，确保排版整洁一致。此外，该插件还支持标点符号的全角/半角转换，进一步优化文本排版的专业性和视觉效果。


使用场景

如果你的设计规范中，中文和英文使用了不同的字体，你可以尝试使用该插件对一个文本图层分别调整中文和英文字体样式。


功能说明

选择中文字体和英文字体，插件将自动更新对应文本图层的字体样式。

可以设置中英文混排的间距，插件将自动检测中文和英文之间的间距，并根据设置进行调整。

可以设置字体的字体家族、粗细程度、大小和行高，将所需的字体样式设置为 Figma 字体样式（Text Styles）。


注意事项

你需要将所需的字体样式设置为 Figma 字体样式（Text Styles），然后通过选择目标字体样式进行相应更新。

由于 Figma 的策略限制，使用 Library 字体样式需要先关联相应的 Library 。


-----


Here's the translation of your text into English:

"This plugin assists you in applying specific font styles (i.e., Text Styles) in Chinese-English mixed typography, automatically inserting spaces between Chinese characters and half-width English letters, numbers, and symbols to ensure tidy and consistent formatting. Additionally, it supports the conversion of punctuation marks between full-width and half-width, further enhancing the professionalism and visual appeal of your text layout.

Usage Scenarios

If your design standards involve using different fonts for Chinese and English, you can try this plugin to adjust Chinese and English font styles separately for a text layer.

Function Description

Select Chinese and English fonts, and the plugin will automatically update the corresponding text layer's font styles.

Set spacing for Chinese-English mixed layout; the plugin automatically detects and adjusts the spacing between Chinese and English according to your settings.

Set the font family, weight, size, and line height, and establish the desired font styles as Figma Text Styles.

Notes

You need to set the required font styles as Figma Text Styles and then update them by selecting the target font styles.
plugins.tagline: 中英文混排字样式插件 （支持字体样式变量）

plugins.name: Airfig
plugins.description:
Airfig lets you flow content from Airtable into your Figma designs.


Introducing Airfig - the must-have plugin for seamlessly integrating your Airtable content into your Figma designs!


With Airfig, you can effortlessly map Airtable fields to Figma layers by giving them the same name or using our manual mapping feature. This feature helps you spend less time tinkering with data and more time crafting beautiful designs.


Airfig makes it easy to populate your Figma designs with content from Airtable, whether you want to create tables or tiled layouts of cards with different records from your Airtable. And when your content changes, updating your design is as simple as clicking a button.


What’s more, Airfig allows you to improve your design workflow by allowing others to manage the content while you focus on the design itself. This powerful feature ensures that your designs are always up-to-date with the latest content from your Airtable.


With Airfig, you can take your Figma designs to the next level, creating beautiful, professional-quality work with ease!
plugins.tagline: The Airtable to Figma Layout Tool

plugins.name: Text to CSV to Text
plugins.description:
"Text to CSV to Text" for Figma is your essential tool for seamless text collaboration and content management within the Figma design environment. This powerful, free plugin empowers designers and stakeholders to work together effortlessly, whether it's for translation, content updates, or content generation, all powered by CSV integration.


Key Features:


  1. Export and Import with CSV: Select any text node, component, frame, or page within your Figma project and export it to a CSV file with a single click. Modify the content externally, and then effortlessly import the CSV to update your Figma design with the latest text revisions.
  2. Mixed Style Support: Preserve the integrity of your designs with support for mixed text styles. Whether it's a combination of fonts, sizes, or colors, our plugin retains the original text styling during export and import.
  3. Localization Made Easy: Simplify the localization process by exporting text for translation. Collaborate with your localization team by providing them with the CSV file, and then import the translated content back into your Figma design seamlessly.
  4. Content Collaboration: Engage with your marketing, content, and copywriting teams more effectively. Request content updates directly through the CSV, enabling non-design stakeholders to contribute directly to your design project.
  5. Local and Secure: Rest easy knowing that your data is never sent to external servers. Our plugin operates locally, ensuring the security and privacy of your design assets.
  6. User-Friendly: With an intuitive interface, this plugin is designed to be user-friendly for both designers and non-designers alike. Easily export and import text content without any technical expertise.


Unlock the true potential of collaborative design and streamline your content management workflow with CSV Text Manager for Figma. Start collaborating efficiently, for free, and enhance your Figma design projects with the power of CSV integration.


Support Us: If you're loving this plugin and want to contribute to its continued development, consider buying us a virtual coffee ☕. Every sip fuels our commitment to enhancing your design journey.

Get started now: buymeacoffee.com/sunnyladkani

accepted.name: Sunny
accepted.description: Solving some of the use cases my team encounters when working in Figma.

plugins.name: Speedboat
plugins.description:
Build Tailwind designs and convert them to code with speed! Speedboat helps you by building a panel from your Tailwind configuration. No more quesswork!


Features

Style Library

Opens a panel which will allow you to design using the values from your configuration. Here you can pick your dimensions, fills, shadows and more with just a few clicks. It also offers a handy Copy class names button so you can design and prototype quicker than ever before. 🤯


Copy class names

Copies the selected layer Tailwind-compatible class names for supported properties based on your configuration to your clipboard. If your configuration specifies eg. "brand-blue" colour and your design uses that colour as a Fill, the result copied to your clipboard will be "bg-brand-blue".


Settings

Opens a panel with Speedboat configuration. This panel will allow you to set the base font size for your design (if you use relative units) and import your own Tailwind configuration. The configuration is embedded into the file, so you can share it and don’t have to wory about also having to share the configuration.


Supported properties

  • Dimensions
  • Opacity
  • Corner radius
  • Solid fill
  • Gradient fill (soon)
  • Stroke
  • Shadow
  • Font size
  • Line height
  • Letter spacing
  • Text decoration
  • Text transform
  • Text align
  • Font weight (soon)


Note

Speedboat is a paid plugin. Head to https://speedboat.sh to get your activation code!


FAQ

https://speedboat.sh/faq

plugins.name: Segoe Fluent Icons Search
plugins.description:
🚨 Font Required

This plugin requires Microsoft’s Segoe Fluent Icons font to display icons correctly. Without it, glyphs will appear as empty boxes (□).

  1. Windows 11: No action needed—the font is preinstalled.
  2. Windows 10 & macOS: Download the font from Microsoft for use in design and development.


🔎 Segoe Fluent Icons Search

Segoe Fluent Icons Search makes working with the Fluent icons font in Figma a breeze.

  1. Quickly search Microsoft’s Segoe Fluent Icons
  2. Click to copy any icon glyph
  3. Paste into text layers for seamless use
  4. includes 1,470+ glyphs


🙋 FAQs

► Can I use this with macOS?

  1. Yes! You just need to download Microsoft's Segoe Fluent Icons font and install it. If you're on Windows 10, you'll also need to download the font.

► I installed the font, but I'm still seeing "□" instead of glyphs.

  1. You'll need to restart Figma and relaunch the plugin due to font caching.

► Can I download the SVGs of these icons?

  1. No, not through Segoe Fluent Icons Search—this plugin only allows you to preview and copy individual glyphs.

► A few of the glyphs are still showing as empty boxes (□).

  1. A few glyphs are only available on Windows 11, and not included directly in the downloadable Segoe Fluent Icon font.


This plugin is open-source.

accepted.name: Seth Cottle
accepted.description:
✈️ Product Design Lead at CLEAR.

plugins.name: Style Quick Actions
plugins.description:
Style Quick Actions - Figma Plugin

Quick actions for applying styles to selected including Text, Fill, Stroke, Effect, and Grid. Works with local styles and published Team Library styles. Also works with Color Variables.


Local styles will always be available options, no management necessary. To learn how to access styles from other files, read 'Using Published Figma Team Library Styles' below.


Recommended Use


Quick Key Combos

To quickly select the commands from the quick actions input, type:

  1. qfl for Fill
  2. qsk for Stroke
  3. qtx for Text
  4. qgd for Grid
  5. qef for Effect


For example, to set a Fill quickly, type: ⌘/ > qfl > pri-blu-1 to match 'primary-blue-fill-01'


Key Bindings

You can set custom keybindings on MacOS that will automatically open one of the style fills. This is probably possible on Windows too, but I don't know the details.

  1. Navigate to: System Preferences > Keyboard > Shortcuts > App Shortcuts > click "+"
  2. Select Application: "Figma.app" and set shortcut for plugin commands by pasting in the "Menu Title" in this format: Plugins->Plugin Name->Plugin Command


I prefer to set the actions for setting Fill, Stroke, and Text to:

  1. ⌃F - Fill - Plugins->Style Quick Actions->Fill
  2. ⌃S - Stroke - Plugins->Style Quick Actions->Stroke
  3. ⌃T - Text - Plugins->Style Quick Actions->Text


Read more on Apple Support


Using Published Figma Team Library Styles


To use Team Library Styles in another file

  1. Publish your file as a Figma 'Team Library'
  2. Publish your file by running 'Style Quick Actions > Publish Library Styles'
  3. In the another file, run 'Style Quick Actions > Toggle Library Styles' and select the library
  4. The Styles will now be available in the Fill, Stroke, Text, Effect, and Grid Style selectors


You will have to update Published Styles every time the Team Library Styles are updated.

  1. Update Published Styles by running 'Style Quick Actions > Publish Library Styles' again.


Delete styles by running 'Style Quick Actions > Remove Library Styles'


Caveats:

  1. Library Styles are saved in this plugin based on their source file name. If that file name changes, the plugin will treat it as a new Published Library Style. If you change the a source file name, delete the old one and re-publish.
  2. There is a max memory limit of 1MB for each plugin. This means there is a limited number of styles you can publish via this plugin. There is a percentage % next to the Published Style name that displays how much of the total memory each Library takes up.
  3. You can't Toggle Published Styles in their own source library. Those styles are always available locally.


GitHub Repo

accepted.name: James Bradford
accepted.description: UX Design & UI Development

You can set custom keybindings on MacOS that will automatically open one of the style fills. This is probably possible on Windows too, but I don't know the details.

  1. Navigate to: System Preferences > Keyboard > Shortcuts > App Shortcuts > click "+"
  2. Select Application: "Figma.app" and set shortcut for plugin commands by pasting in the "Menu Title" in this format: Plugins->Plugin Name->Plugin Command


I prefer to set the actions for setting Fill, Stroke, and Text to:

  1. ⌃F - Fill - Plugins->Style Quick Actions->Fill
  2. ⌃S - Stroke - Plugins->Style Quick Actions->Stroke
  3. ⌃T - Text - Plugins->Style Quick Actions->Text


Read more on Apple Support


Using Published Figma Team Library Styles


To use Team Library Styles in another file

  1. Publish your file as a Figma 'Team Library'
  2. Publish your file by running 'Style Quick Actions > Publish Library Styles'
  3. In the another file, run 'Style Quick Actions > Toggle Library Styles' and select the library
  4. The Styles will now be available in the Fill, Stroke, Text, Effect, and Grid Style selectors


You will have to update Published Styles every time the Team Library Styles are updated.

  1. Update Published Styles by running 'Style Quick Actions > Publish Library Styles' again.


Delete styles by running 'Style Quick Actions > Remove Library Styles'


Caveats:

  1. Library Styles are saved in this plugin based on their source file name. If that file name changes, the plugin will treat it as a new Published Library Style. If you change the a source file name, delete the old one and re-publish.
  2. There is a max memory limit of 1MB for each plugin. This means there is a limited number of styles you can publish via this plugin. There is a percentage % next to the Published Style name that displays how much of the total memory each Library takes up.
  3. You can't Toggle Published Styles in their own source library. Those styles are always available locally.

Create another Plugin for my friends called DoujinFigma which is easier to setup by just hosting Stable DIffusion Server in Colab with one click.

https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1322043616222309506/doujinfigma


Free and open source plugin for you to use Figma with Stable Diffusion as Designers' Wingman.

Include features such as

Sketch Rendering - Try different shaders for your sketch before using 3D rendering software.

Rework foreground and background - Change part of the images for your products for different mood.

Generate images from sketch.

Generate vectors from image.

Pick different style for images generation for different design projects.


Since this still a one man project and I am very broke, the official server will close from time to time.

I will add some tutorial on how to setup your own server, or you can find some other tutorial on how to setup Stable Diffusion API on the internet without waiting me.

plugins.name: Composer
plugins.description:
Mail-merge type of plugin. Generate personalized PDFs with Google Sheets


### Note / How-to Use

- Make sure to generate your own Google Sheets-scoped API key so you can access your Google Sheet file

- Make sure your Google Sheet file is visible to anyone with the link (not limited to people added)

- Headers will always be on the first row

 - They can only be alphanumeric, with dashes, and underscores

- Make sure a frame layer is selected

- Make sure to insert `%%{header name}%%`on your text, the plugin will loop over the text layers under the selected frame

- Only Text layer is supported at the moment


### If you're having problems or want something to be better feel free to open an issue!

plugins.name: Plato
plugins.description:
Plato is a Figma plugin that uses custom datasets from Notion to batch fill design drafts with realistic content, making your design process more efficient. Plus, it offers AI generation capabilities for creative inspiration and one-off content filling tasks. Simplify your design workflow with Plato.


This plugin is still a work-in-progress. You can join our Discord server to provide more feedback.

⭐️ Features

  • Translate Text
  • Generate Text
  • Mock database
  • Batch create component instances using Notion Database.
  • Image generation with self-hosted Stable Diffusion
